contents: 1. fol. 1b-2b: Qawl al-azʹhar fīmā yuftá fīhi bi-qawl al-Imām Zufar.
2. fol. 1b-5a: Ifrāgh al-jahd fī ḥukm daʻwá al-yad.
3. fol. 2b-3a: Qawl al-fāṣil al-māḍī fī bayān ḥukm ʻazl al-sulṭān lil-qāḍī.
4. fol. 3b-4a: Suʼāl wa-al-murād fī jawāz istiʻmāl al-misk wa-al-ʻanbar wa-al-zabād.
5. fol. 5b-7a: Aʻlá al-rutab fī ḥukm al-īthār bi-al-qurub.
6. fol. 7b-8a: Qawl al-tāmm fī ʻadam infisākh al-dār al-mustaʼjarah bi-al-inhidām.
7. fol. 8b 9b: Inālat al-arab fī ḥukm istiʻmāl awānī al-fiḍḍah wa-al-dhahab.
8. fol. 9b 16a: Fawaʼid al-muhimmah al-farīdah fī īḍāḥ al-alfāẓ al-gharībah.
9. fol. 16a-20b: Bulūgh al-arab fī bayān arḍ al-Ḥijāz wa-jazīrat al-ʻArab.
10. fol. 21a 22a: Wathīq min al-urwah fī bayān aqsām al-rushwah.
11. fol. 22b-23a: Rafʻ al-ḍalāl fī bayān ḥukm al-taʻzīr bi-akhdh al-māl.
12. fol. 23b-25a: Qawl al-ṣawāb fī ḥukm al-bāb bi-manqūl al-aṣḥāb.
13. fol. 25b-26a: Qawl al-sārr fī ḥukm fināʼ al-dār.
14. fol. 26a-27b: Risālah fī anna al-insān yuḥdithu fī milkihi mā shāʼa wa-law aḍarra bi-jārihi mā lam yafḥush.
15. fol. 28a-b: Izālat al-ḍank fī al-murād min yawm al-shakk.
16. fol. 28b-29a: Iẓhār al-kanz al-khafī fī ʻadam ḍamān al-ṣayrafī.
17. fol. 29b-30a: Istidlāl fī ḥukm al-istibdāl.
18. fol. 30b-31b: Wāḍiḥ min al-nuqūl fī ḥukm al-farāgh wa-al-nuzūl.
19. fol. 31b-32b: Risālah fī ʻadam suqūṭ al-maʻlūm bi-mawt al-mudarris wa-al-ṭalabah fī athnāʼ al-sanah.
20. fol. 33a-b: Manqūlāt al-wāḍiḥah fī al-istithnāʼ fī al-yamīn al-kādhibah.
21. fol. 34a-35b: Nuqūl al-munīfah fī ḥukm sharaf walad al-sharīfah.
22. fol. 36a-37a: Ihānah fī ḥukm ṭalab al-wālid waladahu aḥyānan zaman al-ḥiḍānah.
23. fol. 37a-38a: Itḥāf bi-al-aḥādīth al-wāridah fī faḍl al-ṭawāf.
24. fol. 38b-40b: Dhakhīrat al-nāṣir fī takfīr al-ḥajj lil-tabiʻāt wa-al-kabāʼir.
25. fol. 41a-b: Sayf al-maslūl fī jawāz dafʻ al-zakāh li-āl al-Rasūl.
26. fol. 42a-b: Qawl al-bātt fī īṣāl al-thawāb lil-amwāt.
27. fol. 43a-b: Rafʻ al-ṣawt al-ṣayyit bi-ḥukm isqāṭ al-ṣalāh ʻan al-mayyit.
28. fol. 44a-45a: Muhimmāt al-wājibah li-janāzat al-Muslim al-ḥāḍirah.
29. fol. 45a-46b: Mutʻah fī ʻadam jawāz istikhlāf khaṭīb al-Jumʻah.
30. fol. 45a-46b: Lumʻah fī ḥukm ṣalāt al-arbaʻ baʻda al-Jumʻah.
31. fol. 48b-49b: Taḥsīn al-ʻibārah fī ḥukm al-duhn wa-qad mātat fīhi al-fārah.
32. fol. 49b-51b: Tablīgh al-amal fī ʻadam jawāz al-taqlīd baʻda al-ʻamal.
33. fol. 53b-64a: Nuzhat al-ʻayn fī zakāt al-maʻdinayn.
34. fol. 65b-106a: Niʻmah al-kubrá ʻalá al-ʻālam bi-mawlid sayyid wuld Ādam.

title.@value: [Niʻmah al-kubrá ʻalá al-ʻālam bi-mawlid sayyid wuld Ādam ... etc.].

subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
